title: "Um Dashboard"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(plotly)

theme_set(theme_ipsum())

respostas = read_csv(here::here("data/enade-ccc-2017.csv"),
                     col_types = "cccdccdddc")

cursos = respostas %>% 
    group_by(UF) %>% 
    summarise(n = n(), 
              media = mean(media))

criterios = respostas %>% 
    group_by(UF, categoria) %>% 
    summarise(media = mean(media))

```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Parte 1

```{r}
criterios %>%
    filter(categoria != "Outros") %>%
    ggplot(aes(
        x = reorder(UF, media),
        y = reorder(categoria, media),
        fill = media
    )) +
    geom_tile() + 
    scale_fill_viridis() + 
    theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Parte 2

```{r}
cursos %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = UF, y = media)) + 
    geom_col() + 
    coord_flip()
```

### Parte 3

```{r}
cursos %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = UF, y = n)) + 
    geom_col()
```

```{r}

dados = respostas %>%
    na.omit(.) %>%
    group_by(IES,tema) %>%
    filter(tema == "Oport. Intercâmbio no país" | tema == "Oport. Intercâmbio exterior") %>%
    summarise(media_ies = mean(media)) %>%
    glimpse()
    
c = dados %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = reorder(IES,media_ies),
               y = media_ies,
               color = tema)) +
    geom_point() +
    coord_flip()+
    labs(x="Universidades", y = "Media")
ggplotly(c)
```
